title: Carnivorous
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||Eat [[chunk]]s until Engorged. [[Ration]]s provide less nutrition.||You are carnivorous and can eat meat at any time.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
'''Species notes:''' [[Ghoul]]s, [[felid]]s, and [[kobold]]s start at rank 1. Trolls have innate [[gourmand]] instead.
|-
| colspan="3" |
*This mutation was removed in [[0.26]].
*Prior to [[0.21]], this mutation had three levels.
*Prior to [[0.15]], characters could become partially or completely carnivorous through mutations.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Good_mutations|Good mutation]]
|}

[[Category:Good Mutations]]
